metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0466 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In do_epoll_ctl and ep_loop_check_proc of eventpoll.c, there is a possibleuse after free due to a logic error. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: AndroidkernelAndroid ID: A-147802478References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
